subject: College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. selection committee may have inadvertently done a favor for midmajor conferences — and college basketball connoisseurs — by creating several compelling first-round matchups.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. selection committee may have inadvertently done a favor for midmajor conferences — and college basketball connoisseurs — by creating several compelling first-round matchups.
